Lawrence Harris bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke amụrụ na Colorado Springs, Colorado na 1937
Ọ gụrụ nka na United States na Europe
A maara Harris màkà ihe osise impressionistic (dị ka Abandoned Ship) na ihe osise abstract (dị ka The Cross).
Ihe osise ya n'ozuzu ya enweghị ụbọchị ma bịanye aka na ya na ya na-agbakọta ya
Ebe ngosi nka Denver so n'ime nchịkọta ọha na eze nwere ọrụ Lawrence Harris. E kwesịghị ịgbagwoju ónyé omenkà a ányá na ónyé na-ese ihe n'ala nkè Canada bụ Lawren Harris (1885-1970).
Ihe ndekọ ire ere màkà ihe osise nke Lawrence Harris bụ dollar otu puku na narị na iri asaa

Ihe ndekọ a sitere n'aka Abandoned Ship, irí asaá na abụọ site na irí anọ na asatọ inch mmanụ na-ese on board rere n'ubochí irí na atọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 2007, na Best of the West Auctions (Colorado Springs, Colorado).
